question:
Write a letter to your new employer. In your letter

• explain your situation
• describe your problems
• tell him/her when you think you can start
text: I am writing this letter to you inform that I am not able to start the job  next month due to an accident.

Unfortunately,I had an accident yesterday on the way to my home, once I finished my interview. At the same time, I was hospitalized due to a leg break. However, the doctor decided  that I have to do surgery immediately. In addition, they recommend bread rest for at least one month.Moreover, I believe that after one month I Will be able to step as normal.

In that case, I would start work on the 13th of May. I had talked  to one of your colleagues Julia, she promised me whatever the missing work will cover all the work during my absence days. I hope you will bear with me and I expect your support.
I looked forward to your  kind assistance
